overview: Kemal leads a happy life with his family. One day, Kemal gets into trouble as he witnesses a car accident. A teacher dies in the accident. The house of Kemal, who testified to the incident, is set on fire by unknown persons. In the police investigation, it is revealed that a businessman named Osman Sertoğlu had a hand in both the accident and the arson. However, Osman is released as there is not enough evidence. The only eyewitness the police have is Kemal. For this Osman tries to dissuade Kemal from testifying. To this end, he kidnaps Kemal's wife. However, Kemal has no intention of giving up his testimony.
title: Önce Hayaller Ölür
